title.rendered: “IDF and ISA Joint Operation Recovers Bodies of Abducted Victims: The Tragic Tale of Ron Benyamin and Others”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF and the ISA have recovered the body of the abducted Ron Benyamin, may his memory be a blessing.

The body of the abducted Ron Benyamin, may his memory be a blessing, was extracted in a joint operation by the IDF and the ISA.

From confirmed intelligence information in our possession, Ron Benyamin, may his memory be a blessing, was murdered during the brutal terrorist attack on October 7 at the Ekul Reservoir, and his body was abducted to Gaza by the Hamas terrorists.

His body was retrieved together with the bodies of the abducted Yitzhak Gelrenter, Shani Luk, and Amit Boskila, may their memories be blessings, during a joint operation by the IDF and ISA forces, based on information revealed in ISA interrogations of terrorists arrested in the Gaza Strip and the intelligence direction of the Missing and Captive Persons Division in the Intelligence Branch.

After an identification process carried out by medical professionals at the National Institute of Forensic Medicine and the Israel Police, representatives of the IDF delivered a message to the family today. The IDF and the ISA share the family’s pain at this difficult time.

The IDF and ISA continue, even at this hour, to employ all operational and intelligence means, taking operational risks, in order to realize the national supreme mission of returning all the abducted persons.
